price: Akasema: Mola wangu Mlezi! Nipe muhula mpaka siku watayo fufuliwa viumbe.
arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ فَأَنظِرۡنِيٓ إِلَىٰ يَوۡمِ يُبۡعَثُونَ
footnotes: Iblisi akasema: Mola Mlezi! Nipe muhula, wala usinifishe mpaka Siku ya kufufuliwa viumbe.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: qāla rabbi fa-anẓir'nī ilā yawmi yub'ʿathūna
